function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of interdisciplinary collaboration may hinder effective pandemic response","Impact":"Failure to understand virus spread patterns and develop effective treatments","Mitigation":"Promote interdisciplinary collaboration and coordination","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms and communication tools","People":"Medical scientists, biologists, public health researchers, mathematicians, computer scientists, social and behavioural scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of social and behavioral factors may lead to ineffective policies","Impact":"Failure to address mental health issues, social isolation, and anxiety during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Incorporate social and behavioral sciences in policy development","Technologies":"Data analytics, survey tools, behavioral modeling software","People":"Social and behavioural scientists, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Failure to advance vaccines and treatments due to lack of collaboration between medical and non-medical disciplines","Impact":"Inability to develop effective vaccines and treatments for viral diseases","Mitigation":"Foster collaboration between medical and non-medical disciplines","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data sharing tools, virtual conferencing","People":"Medical scientists, biologists, public health researchers, mathematicians, computer scientists, social and behavioural scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations, government agencies"}]}
